text: Agñɨlɨg agak, Nɨgɨm. Chɨn Jelusalem amon, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop mɨmug gɨl, dɨl bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok sek, bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok sek kɨlop ñɨnɨgab agak. Ñek, kɨli takaw aglɨl agɨnɨgabal, Bɨ anɨb awl nop paklep agɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb agɨl, bɨ Juda mel okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgabal agɨlak.
